messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] unschooling sibling relationships
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Jon and Rue Kream **No crappy mother is raising that sweet, lovey little girl!  I think lots of 11 year olds have trouble expressing their feelings.
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Jon and Rue Kream

**No crappy mother is raising that sweet, lovey little girl! I think lots
of 11 year olds have trouble expressing their feelings. It sucks that you
landed in Stickuptheirbutts USA.**

I have to agree with Rue, Shyrley.

I saw you with your kids, both at the conference and at your home. You are not a crappy mother.

It does take time for all of us to learn how to live peacefully. Especially when we weren't raised that way. On bad days I tell myself, "one day at a time". Then we talk and talk about it.

You are doing a good job, but its hard to realize that in "Stickuptheirbutts USA"!


**Ever since the conference we've all been feeling more
lonely, because we know you all are out there.**

Ah, yes, its the same here :(



Kelli~





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
